creditline: The Douglas J. and Victoria Galloway Holmen Endowment Fund and the Textile Miscellaneous Purchase Fund
description: cream ground; pattern consists of undulating blue and red ribbon-like forms creating overall ogival lattice structure punctuated by flowers and other vegetal forms in blue, green, red, purple and yellow; blue silk ribbon banding at one long side
markings: at one short side, stamped in tan: square stamp VEIC (English East Indian Company)
medium: Painted, mordant dyed, and resist dyed plain weave cotton
title: Textile panel
